name: Villain
description:
Made for Unreal Engine 4's 2019 Spring Game Jam. The other side of the coin of every hero's tale is a villain's journey. Play as a scoundrel who seeks a new life across the sea. Earn  your passage on a ship by relying on the skillset you know best--stealing goods at night and trading them to the unsuspecting townfolks of Noobertown during the day! 

WASD to move around. Objects and characters of interest will be outlines when you hover your mouse cursor over them.
